Package ctf2024

Class Team

java.lang.Object
ctf2024.Team
Direct Known Subclasses:
SampleTeam
public abstract class Team extends Object
The class defines a CTF Team, which consists of an ArrayList of 8 Players, a Flag, a team color, a team name, which side of the field the Team is on, and various instance variable to help determine the team's score throughout a match.

  • Constructor Details

    • Team

      public Team(String name, Color color)
      Constructs a new Team with a name and default color. A Flag is automatically added, but Players must be added individually.
      Parameters:
      name - the team's name
      color - the team's default color

  • Method Details

    • generateTeam

      public void generateTeam()
      Generates a Team by adding Players (done in an extending subclass)

    • addPlayer

      public final void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a Player to the Team. When Players are constructed, they should have an initial Location on the LEFT side of the field. When the Team is added to the Grid, Players will automatically be reLocated to the right side of the screen if appropriate.
      Parameters:
      player - - The instance of Player to be added

    • displayStats

      public void displayStats(int steps)
      Displays a Team's stats in the console - usefulful for debugging. DO NOT USE IF FINAL CODE
      Parameters:
      steps - - how many steps

    • adjustForSide

      public final info.gridworld.grid.Location adjustForSide(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc, info.gridworld.grid.Grid<info.gridworld.actor.Actor> grid)
      Adjusts a Location to the proper side
      Parameters:
      loc - The location to be adjusted
      grid - The grid in which the Location is valid
      Returns:
      The adjusted Location

      Parameters:

      Returns:
